ygData.subject: Re: Oh yeah.. Lavastorm notes 2
ygData.msgSnippet: ya, i guess we forgot to mention that everything in lavastorm will resist heat blood =) as far as lifedraw, i always make the top 3 spells my new pet spell,
ygData.messageBody:
ya, i guess we forgot to mention that everything in lavastorm will resist
heat blood =)
as far as lifedraw, i always make the top 3 spells my new pet spell, new
ward spell, and new lifetap spell. damn i love that lifedraw! it was worth
turning L12 just for that. and it is more mana efficient than lifespike,
but its a bigger chunk. at L15 it doesnt really hurt the mana tho.
btw, are there any +int earings, or just the aged ones from before they
changed jewelcraft? and what are they worth around?

belphenor


>From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
>
>Something else I noticed about Lavastorm, everything resists heat blood.
>Which
>is too bad. I guess because it's fire based (?). My best DOT and I can't
>use
>it.. So I have to stick with Engulfing Darkness (resisted 50% of the time)
>and
>Poison Bolt (resisted 20% of the time). Also started using Vampiric Embrace
>because I'm always getting into melee, but I have only seen it go off once
>in
>like 20 battles. Finally bought Lifedraw too (now that I'm making money)
>and
>what a great spell over the lower one. 41pts of damage makes a big
>difference
>in this zone.
>
